attributes.action: Prevent Vulture Funds from seeking redress in UK courts against developing countries debt releif
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Vulture funds are undoing the benefits of developing nation debt relief almost $ for $. Their activity is immoral and developed world taxpayers are in effect subsidising this cynical profiteering at the expense of the worlds poorest nations

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
